testcase.name: Unrep submits claim as owner
testcase.system-out: Given unrep logins into whiplash application................................passed And claimant exits before submitting the claim..............................passed When user continues for claim creation as 'YES' , 'I was the driver' and 'EMAIL' with 'NO','Inside UK'.passed Then claim reference number for unrep claim is created......................passed

testcase.name: Compensator receives claim and claim liability sent to TPA
testcase.system-out: Given Claim is sent to the compensator.....................................passed When compensator receives claim and send to TPA.............................passed Then claims acceptance and liability decision is now sent to TPA............passed

testcase.name: TPA Accepts full liability
testcase.system-out: Given the claim has been sent to the TPA workbasket........................passed When TPA accepts full liability.............................................passed Then claims acceptance and liability information is passed to claimant......passed

testcase.name: unrep Claimant makes medical provider selection (DME) and adds losses and documents
testcase.system-out: Given the unrep claim moves to full liability...............................passed When unrep selects medical preferences for an DME...........................passed Then medical preferences are sent to Independent Expert.....................passed

testcase.name: DME uploads report-No prognosis
testcase.system-out: Given claimant selects DME..................................................passed When claimant visits DME and completes checkup..............................passed Then DME uploads report no prognosis........................................passed

testcase.name: Claimant add losses and fee
testcase.system-out: Given DME uploads medical report............................................passed When 'unrep' add losses and fee.............................................passed Then claim will proceed to upload medical reports...........................passed

testcase.name: Claimant decides to proceed with offer
testcase.system-out: Given claimant reviews medical report when uploaded by DME..................passed When Claimant reviews report and proceed to offer...........................passed Then claim will be sent to compensator for review...........................passed

testcase.name: Claimant should not be able to add losses/fee
testcase.system-out: Given claimant has proceeded with offer.....................................passed When Claimant tries to add loss or fee......................................passed Then claimant should not be allowed to add loss/fee.........................passed

testcase.name: TPA should not be able to add losses/fee
testcase.system-out: Given claimant requests offer to TPA........................................passed When TPA tries to add loss/fee..............................................passed Then TPA should not be allowed to add loss/fee..............................passed

testcase.name: TPA provides first offer with fee proposal
testcase.system-out: Given claimant requests offer to TPA........................................passed When the TPA makes first offer with fee proposal............................passed Then claim will be sent for claimant acknowledgement........................passed

testcase.name: TPA decides to withdraw the offer
testcase.system-out: Given TPA has made first offer to claimant..................................passed When TPA withdraws the offer at claim 'Pending-ReviewOffer'.................passed Then TPA gets an option to replace the offer................................passed

testcase.name: TPA makes replacement offer
testcase.system-out: Given TPA has withdrawn the first offer.....................................passed When replacement offer is made to claimant..................................passed Then claim offer is sent to claimant review.................................passed

testcase.name: Claimants accepts final offer from TPA
testcase.system-out: Given TPA has given replacement offer.......................................passed When Claimant accept the replacement offer..................................passed Then claim is resolved......................................................passed
